name: 高楷雲
objective:
本課程深入了解企業實現淨零碳排的原則與實踐。課程探討永續轉型的策略，著重於將永續性融入商業運營以及實現淨零排放的過程。透過理論知識與實務案例的結合，學生將學習如何在其組織內部開發和實施有效的永續策略。
This course provides an in-depth understanding of the principles and practices behind achieving net zero carbon emissions in a corporate setting. It explores the strategies for sustainable transformation, focusing on the integration of sustainability into business operations, and the journey towards achieving net zero emissions. Through a combination of theoretical knowledge and practical case studies, students will learn how to develop and implement effective sustainability strategies within their organizations.
